  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleBook

    public class RuleBookRunner4PojoClasses
extends AbstractRuleBookRunner
    Runs a List of POJO Rules as a RuleBook.

      Creates a new RuleBookRunner using the specified POJO Rules and the default RuleBook.

        Parameters:
        ruleBookClass - the RuleBook type to use as a delegate for the RuleBookRunner
        pojoRules - the package to scan for POJO rules
